prompt: A bold, print-ready vector illustration centered on a vibrant hot pink solid background. Clean continuous black contour around the entire artwork, even-weight stroke. Graphic: three stylized dynamic silhouettes in a heroic trio pose, connected by a sweeping crescent arc that trails into a small star at the right tip; silhouettes rendered as crisp, high-contrast shapes filled with a smooth cyan-to-magenta-to-purple gradient, with minimal internal detail to preserve a billboard-friendly silhouette look. Typography and layout: large geometric futuristic sans wordmark centered beneath the figures reading TEXT English: "HUNTRX", matching the same cyan-magenta gradient, tight tracking, strong horizontal baseline, angular cuts and custom negative-space details on the letters to emphasize a tech/sci-fi aesthetic. Composition: balanced stacked layout with figures above and wordmark below, all elements aligned to center, generous clear space for printing. Finish: flat, clean, print-ready design with no textures, no drop shadows; isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
negative_prompt: no mockup, no garment, no fabric, no shadows, no photography, no background textures, no watermarks, no extra text, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.notes: Text appears as a single geometric wordmark 'HUNTRX' in capital letters with stylized angular cuts; last two characters form a distinctive R and X treatment but remain legible as 'RX'.
